record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - November 05, 2007)

[Page: H12482]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I regret that flight delays prevented me from being to vote today. Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on the motion to close portions of the conference on H.R. 3222, H.R. 513, and H. Res. 744.
